titles.title: Recognizing the roles and the contributions of America's certified nurse-midwives and certified midwives in providing high-quality, evidence-based, cost-effective, and essential sexual and reproductive health care services to women and pregnant people.

Recognizing the roles and the contributions of America's certified nurse-midwives and certified midwives in providing high-quality, evidence-based, cost-effective, and essential sexual and reproductive health care services to women and pregnant people.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes National Midwifery Week and the contributions of certified nurse-midwives and certified midwives in providing sexual and reproductive health care services.
